snippet: The lawsuit says Trump University gave seminars and classes under the guise of being an accredited school and pressured people to spend up to $35,000 on mentorships....
lead_paragraph: The lawsuit says Trump University gave seminars and classes under the guise of being an accredited school and pressured people to spend up to $35,000 on mentorships.

headline.main: Trump Lawyers Agree to Settlement Talks in University Suit
headline.print_headline: Agreement on Talks in Trump University Suit
